DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety Grass-SPIRE compare placebo evaluate treatment effect Grass-SPIRE symptom use rescue medication grass pollen season
DOC.criteria: Clinical history grass polleninduced allergic rhinitis without conjunctivitis least 2 year Score ≤ 21 RCAT questionnaire Rye grass specific IgE ≥ 0.7 kU/L Positive skin prick test Rye grass whole allergen extract History finding significant disease Asthma require GINA Step 3 high treatment History severe drug allergy , severe angioedema systemic allergic reaction Course shortduration allergyspecific immunotherapy 3 month treatment longduration allergen immunotherapy within 5 year Contraindications administration epinephrine
